methodology: Web search for social media promotion evidence on Reddit, Twitter, StockTwits, Discord

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: Oriental Culture Holding Ltd
findings: Reddit users identified OCG as part of suspected pump group with TKAT, JFIN, ZKIN
YouTuber Matt Kohrs was offered money to promote ZKIN (same pump group)
Reddit users called TKAT and OCG 'apparently fraud'
Up 60%+ with 'no real news' - characterized as 'low-float, prior pump behavior'
1-for-220 reverse split to maintain Nasdaq listing

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: Datavault AI Inc.
findings: Reddit short squeeze movement organized against Wolfpack Research
Retail traders on Reddit vowing to turn selloff into a short squeeze
AI+crypto narrative moonshot hype on social media forums
17 insider sales, 0 purchases in past 6 months (insiders dumping)
Benzinga: 'AI hype and retail fury remain an explosive mix'

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: Momentus Inc.
findings: 28,366% jump in retail message volume on StockTwits in 24 hours
Sentiment flipped from 'bearish' to 'extremely bullish' in one week
Stock lost 94% in 12 months before sudden 80% surge
'Space-Defense Hype Ignites Retail Frenzy' - StockTwits headline

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: China SXT Pharmaceuticals
findings: Jumped 200% on AI news, then dropped 37.5% next session
Investing.com forum: 'jumped without any news, that was absolutely manipulation'
Users noted 'hedge funds stepped in & shorted millions of shares'

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: AlphaTON Capital Corp.
findings: Filed $420.69M shelf registration (meme number signals retail targeting)
TON blockchain + Telegram + Claude AI integration hype
Dropped 64% in one month, then pumps repeatedly on crypto news
Tiny public issuer positioning for massive capital raise

confirmedPromotionEvidence.name: VinFast Auto Ltd.
findings: Famed investor Jim Chanos called it a meme stock
Wolf Street: 'shares are getting pumped maniacally to ridiculous highs'
Some noted 'standard stock price manipulation by insiders'
Surged from $10 to $90, market cap briefly exceeded Ford and GM combined

suspectedPromotionActivity.name: JIADE Limited
findings: Chinese shell company pattern similar to OCG/TKAT group
Nasdaq compliance issues

suspectedPromotionActivity.name: Mingteng International Corporation
findings: Chinese shell pattern
Nano-cap with buzzword name
platforms: Unknown - too small for mainstream tracking

suspectedPromotionActivity.name: D. Boral ARC Acquisition I Corp. Warrant
findings: SPAC warrant jumped +324% after hours
Blank check company with no target

suspectedPromotionActivity.name: TryHard Holdings Limited
findings: Suspicious ticker name targeting retail/gamers
Pump-and-dump pattern

pumpGroupsIdentified.name: Chinese Penny Stock Coordinated Pump Group
pumpGroupsIdentified.evidence: Reddit users identified coordinated pumping; YouTuber offered paid promotion for ZKIN

pumpGroupsIdentified.name: DVLT Reddit Short Squeeze Movement
pumpGroupsIdentified.evidence: Organized response to Wolfpack Research short report on Reddit

pumpGroupsIdentified.name: Space/Defense SPAC Retail Hype
pumpGroupsIdentified.evidence: 28,366% message volume spike, coordinated StockTwits activity

promotersIdentified.name: Matt Kohrs (YouTube)
promotersIdentified.evidence: Was offered money to promote ZKIN (Chinese penny stock)
promotersIdentified.disclosed: Publicly disclosed the offer but unclear if accepted

regulatoryContext: Nasdaq tightened China listing rules in 2025 due to pump-and-dump concerns
SEC Q2 2025 enforcement newsletter: scheme left retail investors holding worthless penny stock positions
Four individuals charged with Telegram pump-and-dump scheme (Australia) - 15 years imprisonment possible
